title: Naturopathic Schools
sitename: Naturopathic Schools : Oregon Board of Naturopathic Medicine
cleaned_text: There are eight schools, recognized by the Oregon Board of Naturopathic Medicine, that hold full accreditation in the teaching of Naturopathic medicine. Other schools are candidates for accreditation with the Council on Naturopathic Medical Education (CNME). CNME is recognized by the U.S. Secretary of Education as the national accrediting agency for programs leading to Doctor of Naturopathic Medicine (ND or NMD) or Doctor of Naturopathy (ND) degrees. For more information on the CNME you can go to their web site [www.cnme.org](http://www.cnme.org/) The following schools hold full accreditation as schools of Naturopathic Medicine: American College of Naturopathic Obstetrics/NUNM Portland, Oregon USA [www.naturopathicmidwives.org/ACNO](/obnm/docs/websitecurrentlyunderconstruction.pdf) Bastyr University Kenmore, Washington USA [www.bastyr.edu](http://www.bastyr.edu/) Bastyr University San Diego, California USA [www.bastyr.edu](http://www.bastyr.edu/) Boucher Institute of Naturopathic Medicine (BINM) New Westminster, British Columbia, CAN [www.binm.org](http://www.binm.org/) Canadian College of Naturopathic Medicine (CCNM) 1255 Sheppard Ave E., Toronto, CAN [www.ccnm.edu](http://www.ccnm.edu/) National University of Health Sciences (NUHS) Lombard, Illinois USA [NUHS](http://www.nuhs.edu/admissions/naturopathic-medicine/) National University of Natural Medicine (NUNM) Portland, Oregon USA- [www.nunm.edu](http://www.nunm.edu/) Southwest College of Naturopathic Medicine (SCNM) Scottsdale. Arizona USA [www.scnm.edu](http://www.scnm.edu/) University of Bridgeport-College of Naturopathic Medicine (UBCNM) Bridgeport, Connecticut USA [www.bridgeport.edu](http://www.bridgeport.edu/)
